body: Kobold tricksters are experts at crafting deadly traps—both magical and mundane—and at striking from concealment while their enemies are distracted by the traps' effects.
name: Kobold Tricksters

sections.ac: 19, touch 14, flat-footed 16 (+4 armor, +3 Dex, +1 natural, +1 size)
sections.other_gear: chain shirt, mwk spear, sling, 8 gp
sections.feats: Brew Potion, Extra Bombs, Throw Anything

sections.body: During Combat The kobold uses her mutagen and extracts to strengthen her defense, and throws bombs at her enemies.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.special_qualities: alchemy (alchemy crafting +2, identify potions), crafty, mutagen (+4/-2, +2 natural, 20 minutes), poison use
sections.name: Kobold Bomber
sections.skills: Acrobatics +3, Craft (trapmaking) +9, Disable Device +6, Escape Artist +3, Knowledge (engineering) +4, Perception +3, Profession (miner) +3, Stealth +10
sections.combat_gear: potion of invisibility, acid, alchemist's fire (3)

sections.ac: 21, touch 15, flat-footed 17 (+5 armor, +4 Dex, +1 natural, +1 size)
sections.other_gear: +1 chain shirt, dagger, mwk shortbow with 20 arrows, mwk artisan's tools, mwk thieves' tools, 62 gp
sections.feats: Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Skill Focus (Craft [trapmaking])

sections.body: During Combat If the master trapper's enemies aren't near her traps, she fires arrows or uses her necklace of fireballs .
